UNCG Stories

Dressing for Success

Cassidy Burel ‚Äô20 had never threaded a needle before she came to UNCG. A consumer, apparel and retail studies degree from the Bryan School gave her the creative inspiration and business know-how to build her own business creating custom bridal and evening wear.
